violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error: Clerk: auth() was called but Clerk can't detect usage of clerkMiddleware() - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: MUST have clerkMiddleware() exported from src/middleware.ts with proper matcher configuration. Middleware must run for all routes where auth() is called.

lines.content: // (In a real scenario, this would be detected by checking for src/middleware.ts)
